attributes.action: Write to all drivers that are registered with the DVLA to find out the publics views on Road tax as not everyone has a computer and therefore i beleive that there are more members of the public against ROAD TAX!!!!!!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please sign my petition to get letters posted out to all of the DVLA registered members of the public, so that they get a chance to give there views on Road Tax as not every memeber of the public have a computer!

rejection.details: Please email comments on the epetitions system to "team@petitions.pm.gov.uk"
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
